lead_paragraph: The Atlanta BeltLine project, which would circle the city’s urban core with a biking and pedestrian loop, aims to rejuvenate an area known for suburban sprawl.

headline.print_headline: Atlanta’s Path to Rebirth Starts With a Sidewalk
headline.main: A Glorified Sidewalk, and the Path to Transform Atlanta

snippet: The Atlanta BeltLine project, which would circle the city’s urban core with a biking and pedestrian loop, aims to rejuvenate an area known for suburban sprawl....
abstract: Atlanta residents embrace Atlanta BeltLine as transformative path to better living and greener commuting; 22-mile area of abandoned railway lines is designated to become biking and pedestrian loop as well as commuter rail line; only small portion has been completed, but fact that 1.3 million people have visited two-mile portion of path already open is testament to city's enthusiasm for plan.
